title: Number of U.S. Pinterest users 2017 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 2 number of Sexs.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
There is a difference of 26.3 between the maximum Sex Female and minimum Sex Male.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 2 number of Sexs.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 2 number of Sexs.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
There is a difference of 26.3 between the maximum Sex Female and minimum Sex Male.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The highest Sex Female has 26.3 more Number of users in millions than the lowest Sex Male.
The average Number of users in millions in all 2 Sexs is 45.75.
The Number of users in millions is 91.5 if we add up values of all Sexs.
